contentList.content: Dragon-like scales cover parts of your skin. When you aren't wearing armour, your base <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is 13 and you can add your Constitution modifier instead of your Dexterity modifier.

Bind your magic to a weapon for 1 Sorcery Point to become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it and it gains a +1 to attack and damage rolls. At 5th level the cost increases to 2 sorcery points and you can make an attack with it as a bonus action after casting a spell. At 10th level the cost increases to 3 sorcery points and the bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.
Bind to your main hand weapon. Its damage becomes magical and you become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it if you weren't already.

You can only have 1 bound weapon at any time.

The weapon returns to its previous state if you are more than [1] away from it for more than 10 rounds.
The sorcerer bound to this weapon is always <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it. The weapon's damage is magical.
